channel.title: Portal
channel.description: Does anybody know the code to make a portal require a certain combat lvl?

item.title: Portal
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

No problemo, I think it is possible, and I am pretty sure I have seen it before I just can’t write it off the top of my head though.

Sorry.

Hey actually try this, it may work.

case 7319: // High Train Portal
if(combat >= 80){
teleportToX = 3243;
teleportToY = 9361;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the High Training Area!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 80+ combat to enter this portal.”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Portal
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

You got the right idea going.
Try this:

case 7319: // High Train Portal
if(playerLevel[2] >= 98){
teleportToX = 3243;
teleportToY = 9361;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the High Training Area!”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need 80+ combat to enter this portal.”);
}

That’s for strength, I don’t think I have a method for total level, let me check.

Read full topic
